      • supportedReversalRoutineKey

        public RoutineKey supportedReversalRoutineKey()
        从接口复制的说明: ReversalOrCancelStrategy
        Determine what kind of transaction will be cancelled/reversed by the concrete ReversalOrCancelStrategy implementation.
        指定者:
        supportedReversalRoutineKey 在接口中 ReversalOrCancelStrategy
        覆盖:
        supportedReversalRoutineKey 在类中 AbstractReversalOrCancelStrategy
        另请参阅:
        ReversalOrCancelStrategy.supportedReversalRoutineKey().

      • cancelOrReverse

        public boolean cancelOrReverse(Context<?> respCtx,
                      Transaction targetTrans)
                        throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: ReversalOrCancelStrategy
        Cancel the target transaction.
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of cancellation request.
        targetTrans - The transaction which is intended to be cancelled.
        返回:
        true if cancel declined, or false.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException
